title: Scraper tool with pivoting handle

claims.preamble: I claim the ornamental design for a scraper tool with pivoting handle, as shown and described.

description: FIG. 1 is a perspective view of a scraper tool with pivoting handle showing our new design;
FIG. 2 is a top plan view thereof;
FIG. 3 is a bottom plan view thereof;
FIG. 4 is a front elevational view thereof;
FIG. 5 is a rear elevational view thereof;
FIG. 6 is a right side elevational view thereof; and,
FIG. 7 is a left side elevation view thereof showing the scraper tool in a pivoted position.
The left side elevation of the scraper tool is a mirror image of the right side elevation, and thus is not shown.
The broken lines are included for the purpose of illustrating environmental structure and form no part of the claimed design.
